transcript: I got Flack from a bunch of parents they were like I really want the best for my kids I was like that's not true you want a version of your children who serves what you think will make you look the best the interesting thing with family is that family I would say more often than not has a closer alignment with your long-term goals than strangers do and so it makes sense that family would have more aligned interest but not completely aligned interest with you cuz the only person who has a completely aligned interest with you is future you keeping that as the litmus test of whose opinion I'm going to listen to although it's more difficult has ultimately been very fruitful for me
